short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Understand the risk profile of all your browser extensions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Understand the risk profile of all your browser extensions.  Chrome Extension Auditor retrieves a list of your installed Chrome extension, retrievies their known risks via Crxcavator, and presents you with related risk information and links back to Crxcavator.

Permissions:
Management - retrieve a list of installed extensions
Declarative net request - prepare HTTP headers for API calls to Crxcavator
Host permissions for crxcavator.com - make API calls to Crxcavator to retrieve extension metadata
